newsitem.title: FRANCE: Elyo posts profit in 1996, ups div.
newsitem.headline: Elyo posts profit in 1996, ups div.

text.p: (Figures in millions of French francs unless stated)
NOTE - Elyo, now owned by Lyonnaise des Eaux, published its results in a statement, saying sales were up 8.3 percent, or 7.6 percent on a like-for-like basis.
It said the large drop in exceptional charges was the result of the completion of restructuring of subsidiaries and that there had also been a capital gain on a Gaz de Strasbourg sale.
